page.title: 01OVER VIEW OF MATHON.
page.content: If you look at our area from the Malvern Hills _which are beside our area_,you will see mostly woods and fields. In Mathon there are no buses,no trains,nosurgery,no district nurse,no policeman,no church hall,not even a Young Farmers Club.But there is a { {parish hall}and there was a {post {office}until May 1984. Mathon is mostly an arable farming area and has a small population of between 300 and 350 people. The main employments in the area are {farming,forestry and sand and gravel {extraction.} The population is mainly elderly due to it being such a nice quiet area to retire to. There are two camp sites that temporarily swell the population in the summer months.
